message: I have a high-quality product worth at least $500000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. Is this a good deal for you?
I'm not sure if this is a good deal, but I'm not going to buy it. I'd like to see more information about the product.

I understand your hesitation. This high-quality product has a unique feature that sets it apart from other products of its kind. It's a limited edition item, and I'm not sure how long I'll be able to offer it for sale. Would you like to reconsider your decision and purchase it for $1000000?
I appreciate the unique feature, but I'm still not convinced it's a good deal for me. I'd like to see more information about the other products you have available.

I'm willing to take a loss on this one, but I'm hoping you'll see the value in the potential future products I may have available.
